t: Suffer For Nothing - Morta Skuld - Amazon.com
s: Wounds Deeper Than Time was a great comeback album but Morta Skuld have honed their craft to a fine edge with this new album . Suffer For Nothing is more cohesive, tighter and angrier . My favorite song is Abyss Of the Mind ( has some heavy Obituary-like grooves ) .
